snippet.title: You Can Now Use Google Image Search To Find Recipes
snippet.content:
Scrolling through pictures of food has always been fun, but you can now use Google image search on your phone to easily find recipes while browsing through your favourite food porn.
The change seems to come from , but what it means is that you can find tons of delicious looking (and hopefully delicious tasting) recipes using your phone. To do this, simply:
Type the food you desire into a Google image search on your phone.
Click on the little "recipe" tags you wish to further investigate.
Once you find a recipe you like the look and sound of, you are able to make that delicious-looking image into a delicious-tasting reality, though you'll probably have to go to the grocery store first.
